messages.subject: Re:
messages.msgSnippet: Unschooling is about natural learning in the real world.  The real world has television, movies, computers.  The real world has had recorded music for a
messages.messageBody:
Unschooling is about natural learning in the real world. The real
world has television, movies, computers. The real world has had
recorded music for a hundred years. The real world has only had
Steiner schools for a much shorter and much smaller-percentage- of-
influence time and space.


----we skipped our Waldorf parent and child today so that ds could stay home and play computer by choice. He did not want to go.

Zoie
